36 
38 //
39 // Defines the Replanner class, which listens for replanning requests,
40 // makes the appropriate service calls, and re-sends the service response
41 // back on the appropriate topic.
42 //
43 // NOTE! This class exists because the Planner interface is service-based,
44 // rather than pub/sub-based, and the PlannerManager cannot afford to wait for
45 // the service calls to finish (i.e. for the planner to compute) before
46 // sending the next planner reference state.
47 //
49 
50 #include <fastrack/planning/replanner.h>
51 
52 namespace fastrack {
53 namespace planning {
54 
55 // Callback for processing replanning requests.
56 void Replanner::ReplanRequestCallback(
57  const fastrack_msgs::ReplanRequest::ConstPtr& msg) {
58  // Make sure server is connected.
59  if (!replan_srv_) {
60  ROS_ERROR("%s: Replan server was disconnected.", name_.c_str());
61  return;
62  }
63 
64  // Make a service call.
65  fastrack_srvs::Replan replan;
66  replan.request.req = *msg;
67  if (!replan_srv_.call(replan)) {
68  ROS_ERROR("%s: Replan server error.", name_.c_str());
69  return;
70  }
71 
72  // Publish trajectory.
73  traj_pub_.publish(replan.response.traj);
74 }
75 
76 // Initialize this class with all parameters and callbacks.
77 bool Replanner::Initialize(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
78  name_ = ros::names::append(n.getNamespace(), "Replanner");
79 
80  // Load parameters.
81  if (!LoadParameters(n)) {
82  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to load parameters.", name_.c_str());
83  return false;
84  }
85 
86  // Register callbacks.
87  if (!RegisterCallbacks(n)) {
88  ROS_ERROR("%s: Failed to register callbacks.", name_.c_str());
89  return false;
90  }
91 
92  initialized_ = true;
93  return true;
94 }
95 
96 // Load parameters.
97 bool Replanner::LoadParameters(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
98  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
99 
100  // Topics.
101  if (!nl.getParam("topic/traj", traj_topic_)) return false;
102  if (!nl.getParam("topic/replan_request", replan_request_topic_)) return false;
103 
104  // Services.
105  if (!nl.getParam("srv/replan", replan_srv_name_)) return false;
106 
107  return true;
108 }
109 
110 // Register callbacks.
111 bool Replanner::RegisterCallbacks(const ros::NodeHandle& n) {
112  ros::NodeHandle nl(n);
113 
114  // Publishers.
115  traj_pub_ = nl.advertise<fastrack_msgs::Trajectory>(
116  traj_topic_.c_str(), 1, false);
117 
118  // Subscribers.
119  replan_request_sub_ = nl.subscribe(replan_request_topic_.c_str(), 1,
120  &Replanner::ReplanRequestCallback, this);
121 
122  // Services.
123  ros::service::waitForService(replan_srv_name_);
124  replan_srv_ = nl.serviceClient<fastrack_srvs::Replan>(
125  replan_srv_name_.c_str(), true);
126 
127  return true;
128 }
129 
130 } //\namespace planning
131 } //\namespace fastrack
